body_html:
It sounds like network connectivity issues in both cases. Try to run it again and check your internet connection that it is not flaky.

@koki0702 the gemmlowp is yet another dependency. it is essentially doing git clone https://github.com/google/gemmlowp.git in the same ~/.cache/bazel/.../.../external directory. But do not download them manually one by one. There is too many. Just fix the internet connection.

@koki0702 the gemmlowp is yet another dependency. it is essentially doing git clone https://github.com/google/gemmlowp.git in the same ~/.cache/bazel/.../.../external directory. But do not download them manually one by one. There is too many. Just fix the internet connection.
body:
It sounds like network connectivity issues in both cases. Try to run it again and check your internet connection that it is not flaky.

@koki0702 the gemmlowp is yet another dependency. it is essentially doing `git clone https://github.com/google/gemmlowp.git` in the same ~/.cache/bazel/.../.../external directory. But do not download them manually one by one. There is too many. Just fix the internet connection.
